title: 大家给点造僵尸小怪的建议
author: xcyf6927
txt_content: 本人要造PVE地图大家给点造僵尸小怪的建议目前之想出了爆浆僵尸（感觉我家厨房）和跳跳僵尸（感谢我家厕所）之类的

replies.author: x_chengz
replies.txt_content: 喷水僵尸

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content: 然而等你有能力实现了再说
召唤小僵尸的小僵尸

replies.author: xcyf6927
replies.txt_content:
china521 发表于 2015-10-24 19:49
然而等你有能力实现了再说
我真有能力实现，看看我的地图。话说你也玩暴雪的游戏

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
制作出来了

1.8以及以下
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {IsBaby:1,Riding:{id:Chicken,IsChickenJockey:1},CustomName:"僵尸小怪",CustomNameVisible:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:250},{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:500},{Name:"generic.knockbackResistance",Base:0.15f},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:1f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:10}],Fire:1277951,Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:iron_sword",tag:{display:{Name:"僵尸小手",Lore:["腐肉进化为利剑"]},ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:19,lvl:2},{id:20,lvl:2}]},Count:1},{},{},{},{id:"minecraft:skull",Damage:3}],DropChances:[0.5F,0F,0F,0F,0F]}复制代码

1.9

/summon Chicken ~ ~1 ~ {IsChickenJockey:1,Passengers:[{id:Zombie,IsBaby:1}],CustomName:"僵尸小怪",CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:250},{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:500},{Name:"generic.knockbackResistance",Base:0.15f},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:1f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:10}],Fire:1277951,HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:iron_sword",tag:{display:{Name:"僵尸小手",Lore:["腐肉进化为利剑"]},ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:19,lvl:2},{id:20,lvl:2}]},Count:1},{id:"minecraft:diamond_block",tag:{display:{Name:"僵尸礼包",Lore:["有10几率掉落"]}},Count:5}],HandDropChances:[0.5F,0.1F],ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:"minecraft:skull",Damage:3}]}复制代码

replies.author: 矿工zhanghua
replies.txt_content:
僵王博士←一看就是PVZ玩多了的，造这个很麻烦……
橄榄球僵尸还不错，身披红色染色皮革甲，血量72，速度+0.1很带劲

replies.author: gebi老王
replies.txt_content: 燃烧僵尸 打人有会把人打燃 走过的地方会像打火石点过一样

replies.author: dust_of_heart
replies.txt_content:
日狗僵尸~
就是骑♂着noai狗的高速僵尸

replies.author: jiand_jun~~~
replies.txt_content:
飞机僵尸233
然后加个海陆空僵尸~

replies.author: 注册都很难
replies.txt_content: 给周围同类加血的

replies.txt_content: 好牛逼的样子

replies.author: dust_of_heart
replies.txt_content: 关键是玩家的职业要有趣

replies.txt_content: 表示不知所云

replies.txt_content:
dust_of_heart 发表于 2015-10-26 17:52
关键是玩家的职业要有趣
我作为一个星际玩家对头像好熟悉

replies.author: 【QQ红包】
replies.txt_content: 来一个弓箭手僵尸，用命令方块做，以小白为原型，然后把手臂改成僵尸手臂，头改成僵尸头，然后一身蓝色皮革套，或者一个金套的法师

replies.author: 【QQ红包】
replies.txt_content: 签到ing
